QuestData.Title: The Order Of Things
QuestData.Description:
Essences of ancient souls, tampered with--they bleed from each room. The halls must be restored, the flow of souls redirected.
The spheres hold the key. Seal the breaches, restore the flow, then the vessel may be filled.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use $13oa Containment Spheres to seal the breaches.
QuestData.RewardText: A breath held--anticipation. Soon, the soul will merge, and the song of creation will begin.
